title: CLI Wiedemann Analyzer
desc: I built a linear system solver & analyzer with NTL (C++) based on Wiemann's Monte Carlo algorithm as a supporting tool for my STAR '25 research.

title: The Triangle's Website
desc: I built the UI template for article pages that is reused across 1000+ articles. I also build a custom comment section & handle comment data storage & management.

title: Trash-Collecting Robot
desc: A trash-collecting robot I developed in my internship at Fulbright University Vietnam. I worked on navigation, image processing (object detection), and low-level electrical.

title: Pill Reminder
desc: My team's project for DragonHacks. We worked on a medication system comprised of a Flutter UI, a Flask backend, a MongoDB database, and a ESP-32 driven pill dispenser.

title: NeoPal
desc: An iOS app that leverages AR and CoreML to correct colors for colorblind users in real time with FastAPI backend for personalized accessibility threshold.

title: Drexel Diet App
desc: This is a group project for CI-10X course: a cross-platform Flutter app that helps Drexel students plan meals and meet dietary goals using live data from campus dining halls.

title: Virtual Monkey FSM
desc: A finite-state machine based interactive virtual pet simulator. End-of-course project for Intro to Computer Science, originally programmed and compiled in Tranquility (course's language).

title: Euphoniter - Music blog
desc: A responsive music blog platform for sharing music-related content. It's one of my passion project during early high school, and is also my first exposure to web development.

title: Mr. Discipline Discord Bot
desc: A Discord bot that supports studying tasking, time tracking, music playback, and staying focused. Another passion project for me and my friends.
